item.description:
My friends,

Yutaka, although soon departing back to Japan, is still hard at work making sure our community is aware of many wonderful events. She has informed me of the following Rakugo performances being performed in the Boston area towards the end of the month. Rakugo is a very impressive form of traditional Japanese comedic theater involving only a single person performing in front of an audience. Please try your best to make it to one of these performances since it really is a rare treat.

Also, let me just say that we will miss you SOOOO much, Yutaka! Your hard work over this last year has really made all of our meetups such a huge success!


Yutaka's posting:
--------------------------------
Invitation to Japanese traditional “sit-down” comedy
(Open to the public and Free admission)

Hello all,

This is Yutaka. How are you?

"Rakugo" is Japanese traditional “sit-down” comedy.
This event is played in English for everyone to enjoy.
Welcome and feel free to bring friends, family, and big laughter.

Anyway I'll leave here at the end of Aug, to go back to Japan.
Thank you so much for everything.
I'm so glad that If I'll meetup you in this event.
I'm looking forward to then!

【English Rakugo in BOSTON　2007】
The Art of Laughter is Borderless! Rakugo can make the world laugh!

●Schedule
・Friday Aug, 24th 2:00~3:30pm Kaplan(ESL School)
・Saturday Aug, 25th 2:00~3:30pm 　Citizens Bank Harvard SQ Branch

●Open to the public. Admission is free.

●What is English Rakugo?
Rakugo, often described as Japanese traditional “sit-down” comedy, is a
monodrama with funny stories anyone can enjoy.
Recently Rakugo has gained awareness outside of Japan. 　
Now Rakugo in English is increasing its popularity both inside and outside
of Japan.

●Goals of the event
・Improve cross-cultural understanding by introducing Rakugo as a part of
Japanese culture.
・Provide an interesting insight of traditional Japanese culture and
performance.
・Spread greater recognition of Rakugo.

●More info (.pdf flyer)
http://www.redsox.jp/...

Thank you

YUTAKA
item.name: ~Rakugo~
